overview: Luke Miner was born and raised in Lebanon, Oregon. He is the oldest child of a family of four. At age 18 he started his first business venture, selling Christmas trees in Redding, California. He attended ministry school at Bethel School of Supernatural Ministry. January of 2011 he came together with Brock Ketcher and Naomi Badu to change the face of online fundraising. The next 8 months were spent planning and building an international website that has fast become the largest free fundraising platform on the internet. Today, YouCaring.com connects 1000’s of people everyday, helping individuals with some of their most challenging and life changing experiences - free.

external_links.title: caFree Website Raises Money for Any Cause
